about.title: Connecting Cultures
about.description: We believe Japanese creativity transcends borders. From traditional craft to pop culture, every piece tells a story. Our mission is to share authentic Japanese creations with those who love the culture.

product.whyLoveItTitle:
Japan doesn't begin at the airport.
It lives in the everyday.
product.whyLoveIt1: Behind every item is a moment — a morning ritual, a craft passed down, a detail most people never notice.
product.whyLoveIt2: We don't sell Japan. We share the parts of it that quietly stay with you.
product.whyLoveIt3: Each piece is chosen not for how it looks on a shelf, but for how it feels in a life.
product.whyLoveIt4: No trends. No hype. Only things that belong in someone's everyday.
product.whyLoveIt5: Every product comes with its story — because without it, it's just an object.
product.whyLoveIt6: We stand behind what we send. Simple, honest support from Japan to your door.
